```{python}
#| include: false
# データの読み込み
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

df_all = pd.read_csv('../assets/bookmarks/tech-bookmarks.csv')


def make_clickable(url, title):
    return f'<a href="{url}">{title}</a>'


def extract_tag(tag, df=df_all):
    _df = df[df['Tags'].str.contains(f'{tag}')].copy()
    _df = _df.fillna({'Date': '9999-12-31'})
    _df['Website'] = _df.apply(
            lambda row: make_clickable(row['URL'], row['Title']), axis=1
        )
    _df = _df[['Date', 'Website']].sort_values(
            ['Date', 'Website'], ascending=[False, True]
        )
    _df.index = np.arange(1, len(_df) + 1)
    return _df[['Date', 'Website']].to_html(escape=False, index=True)
```

## 1. Cloud

```{python}
#| code-fold: true
extract_tag('Cloud')
```
